scripts.postinstall: git config --global core.editor 'vim'; git remote add utils git@github.com:codeparkhouston/hs-utils.git; git remote add lion git@github.com:codeparkhouston/code-lion.git; git remote add lessons git@github.com:codeparkhouston/hs-fall-2015.git; git fetch --all
scripts.update: git pull -s subtree utils gh-pages; git pull -s subtree lion gh-pages; git pull -s subtree lessons gh-pages;
